subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Brent Seabrook beat Martin Brodeur from the blue line at the 3-minute 36-second mark of overtime to give the Chicago Blackhawks their third consecutive victory, 3-2, against the visiting Devils.
snippet: Brent Seabrook beat Martin Brodeur from the blue line at the 3-minute 36-second mark of overtime to give the Chicago Blackhawks their third consecutive victory, 3-2, against the visiting Devils.
